title: Calibrate sleepSync timing for modern CPUs
description: Fix frame timing in misc.c sleepSync() to produce playable speeds on modern multi-GHz CPUs. Original timing constants were tuned for 1993-era hardware. Ref: commit ad06385.

title: Add ALSA audio driver
description: New audio/ALSAaudio.c using sox play command for reliable audio playback on modern Linux. Also fix LINUXaudio.c device path from /dev/audio to /dev/dsp for osspd compatibility. Ref: commit ad06385.

title: Fix TrueColor rendering: use gccopy for text and lines
description: Changed DrawLine() and DrawText() in misc.c from triple-draw XOR/AND/XOR pattern (designed for PseudoColor) to single gccopy draw. Fixed white/black color init in init.c to use WhitePixel/BlackPixel instead of colormap lookup. Fixed sleepSync in main.c to only delay during gameplay modes (MODE_GAME/MODE_BALL_WAIT), other modes use XSync without delay for responsive animations. Uncommitted working changes.

title: Fix compilation on modern GCC
description: Fix implicit int declaration in main.c, add missing X11/Xlib.h includes to headers using Display/Window types, make waitMode variables static to fix linker duplicate symbol errors, add missing includes to LINUXaudio.c (stdlib.h, string.h, sys/ioctl.h). Ref: commit ad06385.

title: Capture game screenshots
description: Screenshots of XBoing in action: blocks, demo, editor, gameplay, instructions, keys, preview, and scores screens. Located in screenshots/ directory as GIF files.

title: Add project configuration files
description: Add CLAUDE.md (project instructions for Claude Code), AGENTS.md (beads workflow), .beads/ tracker database, .gitattributes. These configure the development tooling for the project.

title: Modernize XBoing for current Linux systems
description: Initial modernization: Makefile rewrite for gcc/Linux, ALSA audio driver, TrueColor display compatibility fixes, sleepSync timing calibration, .gitignore, xboing.sh launch script. Ref: commit ad06385.

title: Add .gitignore and launch script
description: Add .gitignore for build artifacts (*.o, xboing binary, generated files). Add xboing.sh launcher script with -usedefcmap and -sound flags as default invocation. Ref: commit ad06385.

title: Write SDL2 modernization plan
description: Created docs/MODERNIZATION.md documenting from-to architectural changes for an SDL2-based rewrite: graphics/windowing, audio, build system (Meson), game loop (fixed timestep), data formats (JSON/SQLite), XDG paths, distro packaging (.deb, AppStream, .desktop). Preserves original gameplay constants and physics. Ref: commit 7ee1dbb.

title: Write Makefile for modern Linux
description: Replace Imakefile/Makefile.std with new Makefile: gcc with -O2 -Wall, -I./include -I/usr/include/X11, -lXpm -lX11 -lm linking, audio.c symlink generation, version.c from version.sh, clean target. Ref: commit ad06385.

title: Write comprehensive game specification document
description: Created docs/SPECIFICATION.md (1630 lines, 16 sections) covering every subsystem: build system, X11 graphics, audio, state machine, ball physics, blocks, paddle, guns, scoring, specials, levels, editor, high scores, save/load, UI screens, and module dependencies. All constants verified against source. Ref: commit 5303870.
